title: Video Index
body:
This page contains a list and links to all available videos on how to use various aspects of Network360.

[How to Video: Home Screen](#!/help/articles/how-to-video-home-screen) 

* This video shows the different areas of the Home Screen of Network360.

[How to Video: Navigating Network360](#!/help/articles/how-to-video-navigation-within-network360) 

* This video shows you how to maneuver within Network360.

[How to Video: My Things](#!/help/articles/how-to-video-my-things)

* This video explains how you can access things you had previously created.

[How to Video: Settings](#!/help/articles/how-to-videos-settings)

* This video shows the settings available, such as data last updated dates and user administration.

[How to Video: Selection Criteria - Geography](#!/help/articles/how-to-video-selection-criteria-geo)

* This video will help you understand how the Geography field is used in search criteria.
